title: Process an Unemployment Claim
description: The company has received a request for information from a state unemployment agency regarding a former employee.

tasks.description: Identify the former employee in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR specialist locates the terminated employee's record.

tasks.description: Retrieve the employee's employment dates and reason for separation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist confirms the employee was laid off due to a reduction in force.

tasks.description: Complete and return the state agency's request for information form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist accurately completes the form and submits it to the state agency.
